Package net.minecraft.world.gen

Class NoiseColumnSampler

java.lang.Object
net.minecraft.world.gen.NoiseColumnSampler
public class NoiseColumnSampler extends Object
Samples noise values for use in chunk generation.

    • getOffset

      private double getOffset(int y, double depth, double scale, double randomDensityOffset)
      Calculates an offset for the noise.

      For example in the overworld, this makes lower y values solid while making higher y values air.

      Mappings:
      Namespace Name Mixin selector
      official a Lcpy;a(IDDD)D
      intermediary method_33646 Lnet/minecraft/class_5818;method_33646(IDDD)D
